title: Can Someone Explain please ?
body:
Alright, Let me first say , Yes i was banned but why ? In the three games that it listed it used 2 that my teammates where the negitive impacting force at the start of the game. Its all mid silver elo, and while in most the matches prevously leading to my ban my K/D/A didnt reflect a just amazing player but one with an above 50% win rate. But can i get some clarity why my account was banned when my teams toxcisity starts the issue ? 

Im not looking for "oh its because ur toxic" , No i asked for help in these situations even begged my team in two of the cases they used. what i am after is, is this really all league looks at now is just the reports and bans?
